PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Whips are temporary #b0 cost self-damaging Attack cards.
Creatures with Bleed lose additional HP whenever they lose HP. Each turn, Bleed is reduced by #b1.
Increases block scaling from #yMalleable.
Whenever you lose HP, enemy loses equal HP.
Improves HP gain from healing.
A player state determined by current (permanent) health as a percentage of Max HP.
Deals damage at end of turn.
Current HP at least 2/3 of Max HP.
Current HP between 1/3 and 2/3 of Max HP.
Current HP below 1/3 of Max HP.
HP that is not kept at the end of combat. Does not affect #yForm.
Upon receiving attack damage, gains block. Increases block gained with consecutive attacks.

When played, #yMutate ALL #yMutable cards in deck. When #yMutated, #yMutable cards will toggle between positive #y(Benign) and negative #y(Malignant) versions. Mutation is chosen randomly at the start of combat.
Toggle between a #yMutable card's #yBenign and #yMalignant versions.
This card cannot be #yInfested. All X-cost cards and Powers are #yInert.

Give cards to enemies. Enemies will play ALL #yInfested cards at the end of their turn. Enemies can hold more #yInfested cards the more Max HP they have. Once capacity is reached, the oldest #yInfested card will return to hand.
A card that has been given to an enemy. Enemies will play ALL #yInfested cards at the end of their turn.
A #yMutable card with generally adverse effects.
A #yMutable card with generally positive effects. Any non - #yMutable card is considered #yBenign.
Prevents the next time you would lose HP. Wears off at the end of your turn.
The player or enemy holding a given card.
